bookText.htmlContent: Synthetic morphs are the product of an advancement in synthetic lifeform science, Prof. Ghostie figured out how to generate a synthetic arcane field by [REDACTED] with the [REDACTED].
Synthetic Life experiment #[DATA EXPUNGED], Adendum 3.54, The first case of a synthetic prototype, nicknamed 3MM4, Produced a subitle but not negligable case of being selfaware.
